name: Mind of the Last Thoughts
description:
Are you asking how is this connected with the theme of Paint Jam - The Starry Night? Answer is - Vincent Van Gogh. The Starry Night was painted in 1889, year before Vincent comitted suicide because of depression. Main character of this game is also failure artist, Kevin Smith. After years of depression, Kevin is on the edge of bridge, almost prepared to kill himself. Last fight is happening inside his mind. Should he jump over  or the life still have a price? 

By the way try to play this game with The Starry Night song from don McLean for right atmosphere!

Game was created for Paint Jam
